## About Me

Co-founded multiple digital ventures including Wotagram (15,000 users in 2 months). Specialized in Vue/Nuxt, Node.js, Go, and Dart for high-concurrency applications serving thousands of concurrent users.

Experience spans enterprise CRM systems, container logistics platforms, real-time communication tools, finance applications, and marketplace ecosystems. Currently pursuing B.Sc. in Computer Science at University of the People.
